description: One signature, custom-printed Notesmith wired notebook in A5 (8.5 x 5.5 inches) with 140 pages, 70lb paper, and extra thick cover stock that is laminated on both sides.
longDescription: Our notebooks are made only with high quality materials and are manufactured in our factory in New York. All custom notebooks are made-to-order according to your custom specifications.
name: Pro Wired Notebook A5 (Custom)
infoList: Designed and manufactured in U.S.A. only
High quality, bright white and ultra smooth writing paper
Covers with extra thick cover stock and double-sided lamination

galleryTexts.heading: Fountain pen friendly
galleryTexts.text: A close-up shot of Pilot Iroshizuku Take-sumi (black fountain pen ink) on our 70lb paper.
galleryTexts.alt: Close-up of black ink fountain pen writing on notebook paper

galleryTexts.heading: Double-sided cover lamination
galleryTexts.text: The cover is laminated on both sides and acts as a water-resistant layer.
galleryTexts.alt: Close-up of notebook cover with water droplet, showing water-resistance

galleryTexts.heading: Available in two cover colors
galleryTexts.text: Notebooks are currently available in white or black.
galleryTexts.alt: Close-up of a stack of notebooks

galleryTexts.heading: Gold colored wire binding
galleryTexts.text: Gold colored wire binding and print on the back cover only.

hero.heading: Expertly crafted notebooks
hero.text: Our notebooks are made in-house by printing industry veterans with over 25 years of experience. You can expect a high quality product; crafted with a focus on delivering an excellent writing experience.

infoBoxes.heading: Materials
infoBoxes.text: 70lb text paper, double-mounted 130lb coated cover stock with double-sided lamination, gold wire binding

infoBoxes.heading: Size
infoBoxes.text: 5.5 x 8.5 inches (page size), 6 x 8.5 inches (book size)
